name: team2-demo
description: Development environment for Team 2 Demo - Spring Boot + Angular SPA with Kubernetes

init_hook: kubectl version --client 2>/dev/null || echo kubectl not configured
echo '  ./dev.sh              - Deploy to local Kubernetes (Rancher Desktop)'
echo '  Backend: cd backend && mvn spring-boot:run'
echo '  Frontend: cd frontend && npm install && ng serve'
